main event: An object, described as bell-shaped and silvery metallic, was observed moving erratically for 45 seconds at Floyd Bennett, New York.
interesting points: The object was reported to be similar to a satellite in appearance., There were 11 objects observed in total., The object oscillated and eventually disappeared from view., The sighting occurred at 1704Z on April 6, 1957., The observer's attention was called to the object by someone else.
witness description: Capt. Vertiichilla, Capt. Geddis, and an unspecified observer from Floyd Bennett NAS.
